entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 18. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming west 20 gusting to 40 near midnight. Low minus 18. Wind chill near minus 27. Forecast issued 4:30 PM AST Sunday 12 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 15. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 40 percent chance of flurries early in the morning. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 15. Wind chill near minus 28. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:30 PM AST Sunday 12 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: A few clouds. Low minus 22.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light in the evening. Low minus 22. Wind chill minus 24 in the evening and minus 30 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:30 PM AST Sunday 12 February 2023
